        post: The text of the button is modified.

      • solutionButtonPressed

      • selectionByIndex

        public int selectionByIndex(int i,
                            int j)
                     throws RepeatedBoxException,
                            java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Method which opens the desired box, indicated by the indexes.
        Parameters:
        i - - index which denotes the row of the desired box.
        j - - index which denotes the column of the desired box.
        Returns:
        number - the number of mines surrounding the box or -1 if it is a mine.
        Throws:
        RepeatedBoxException
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
